title: "Drowned" Ice Cream
introduction: Any flavor of ice cream can be 'drowned' in hot espresso, but walnut caramel and cream are two delightful choices. When the hot espresso meets the ice cream, it creates a luxurious, creamy sauce. Liqueur is optional, but can add a delicious depth of flavor.
ingredients: 4 scoops Walnut Caramel or 'Cream' Ice Cream
instructions: Prepare the ice cream, if necessary. Scoop the ice cream into two serving bowls.
If using the liqueur, in a small bowl, mix together the espresso and liqueur, then pour the mixture over the ice cream. Serve immediately.
